title: Reese's Senior Bowl Roster Reveal Show
itunes:title: Reese's Senior Bowl Roster Reveal Show
description:
DJ, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis are joined by Reese's Senior Bowl Executive Director Jim Nagy on this special episode, as the Senior Bowl rosters are revealed. The guys dive into the acceptances and players for each position group throughout the show. First, they talk with LSU cornerback Kristian Fulton, as he talks about what it means to participate in the Senior Bowl (9:43). Next, the guys speak to Auburn defensive end Marlon Davidson as he talks about his game and the talent at Auburn (31:12). Then, they talk with Utah head football coach Kyle Whittingham, as six players from Utah were invited to the Senior Bowl (39:43).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
